feed.title: Diego Rayo | Software Developer
feed.subtitle: Hi, I'm Diego, a Software Developer. I have over 5 years of experience developing Web Solutions. I usually work using JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and GraphQL.

entry.title: Thoughts about my profession
entry.summary: I want to recopile some thoughts about my job and this industry.
entry.content: I want to recopile some thoughts about my job and this industry.

entry.title: My favorite music and MDX
entry.summary: MDX is an extension of Markdown language and I want to explain how I use it to create posts on my website's blog. Thanks to MDX I could insert an HTML widget to show the most listened songs in 2022 according to Spotify.
entry.content: MDX is an extension of Markdown language and I want to explain how I use it to create posts on my website's blog. Thanks to MDX I could insert an HTML widget to show the most listened songs in 2022 according to Spotify.

entry.title: My first post
entry.summary: This is my first post, here I want to welcome you to my website and explain why I built it.
entry.content: This is my first post, here I want to welcome you to my website and explain why I built it.
